data_preprocessed(data_file)[source]¶

Read and preprocess data

Parameters:
data_filestr

name of locally saved data file.

Returns:
df_joinedpolars.DataFrame

Preprocessed data set with 84 observations and 6 variables (subject, gender, scenario, attitude, frequency, mean_pitch).

summariespolars.DataFrame

Mean pitch value grouped by attitude (informel, polite) and gender (female, male).
